name: Castle (itch) (Ludwig)
description:
Castle, Entry for The GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022 

You play as a Lil box knight who must seek a relic from an old forgotten castle but soon realizes that, Death is Only the Beginning,  and that his life is but a stepping stone for his knight brothers.

With what little time I could put into this project (like 5 days at most) I'm happy with what I got done.

CONTROLS:

  • Mouse left/right = direction 
  • W = forward
  • S = backward
  • A = strafe left
  • D = strafe right
  • jump = space (locked at start)
  • die = left/right mouse button (locked at start)
  • destroy stone = E, middle mouse button
  • camera zoom = mouse wheel
  • 1 = toggle god mode (unlock abilities and shift sprint)
